title.narrative: Gabon - Economic and Financial Reform Support Programme - Phase III (PAREF III) - Supplementary Funding
Gabon - Programme d'appui aux réformes économiques et Financières - Phase III (PAREF III) - Financement supplémentaire

description.narrative: Comme le PAREF-I et II, l’objectif du PAREF-III est d’appuyer la mise en œuvre du programme de développement du gouvernement en vue de créer les conditions d’une croissance économique accélérée et inclusive à travers le renforcement de l’assainissement budgétaire et la diversification de l’économie. Ainsi, l’objectif opérationnel pour 2018 consiste à (i) renforcer l’assainissement des finances publiques grâce à une mobilisation accrue des recettes et une rationalisation des dépenses publiques avec un accent particulier sur la maîtrise de la masse salariale et le renforcement de l’efficacité de l’investissement public; et (ii) appuyer la diversification de l’économie à travers l’amélioration du climat des investissements et de la compétitivité du secteur agricole en vue de faciliter la transformation structurelle de l’économie face à l’effondrement des prix du pétrole.

Like PAREF-I and II, the goal of PAREF-III is to support the implementation of the government's development agenda to create the conditions for accelerated and inclusive economic growth through the strengthening of fiscal consolidation and diversification of the economy. Thus, the operational objective for 2018 is to (i) strengthen fiscal consolidation through increased revenue mobilization and public expenditure rationalization, with particular emphasis on controlling the wage bill and enhancing the efficiency of public investment; and (ii) support the diversification of the economy through the improvement of the investment climate and the competitiveness of the agricultural sector in order to facilitate the structural transformation of the economy in the face of the collapse of oil prices.

Le PAREF III bénéficiera à la population Gabonaise dans son ensemble à travers la disponibilité de ressources publiques plus importantes, la rationalisation des dépenses et des réformes spécifiques visant à soutenir une croissance forte, diversifiée et créatrice d’emplois. Il bénéficiera en particulier aux groupes suivants: (i) les populations vulnérables qui pourront bénéficier de meilleures infrastructures et des services sociaux de qualité grâce aux marges de manœuvre budgétaires que permettront de dégager les réformes soutenues par le PAREF III, (ii) les entrepreneurs gabonais et les investisseurs étrangers souhaitant créer une entreprise ou investir dans le cadre des partenariats Public-Privé (PPP) qui bénéficieront d’un cadre plus incitatif et plus transparent et, (iii) les acteurs publics, privés et communautaires impliqués dans le secteur agricole qui bénéficieront d’un cadre plus adéquat pour le développement de leurs activités.

PAREF III will benefit the Gabonese population as a whole through the availability of greater public resources, streamlining of expenditures and specific reforms to support strong, diversified and job-creating growth. It will benefit in particular to the following groups: (i) vulnerable populations who will be able to benefit from better infrastructures and quality social services thanks to the budgetary leeway that the reforms supported by PAREF III will bring about, (ii) Gabonese entrepreneurs and foreign investors wishing to set up a business or invest in Public-Private Partnerships (P3s) that will benefit from a more incentive-based and transparent framework and, (iii) public, private and community actors involved in the agricultural sector who will benefit from a more adequate framework for the development of their activities.

Le présent projet porte sur la troisième phase du Programme d’Appui aux Réformes Economiques et Financières (PAREF-III) au Gabon. Il s’agit d’un financement additionnel qui fait suite à une série de deux opérations d’Appui Budgétaire Général (ABG) programmatique couvrant la période 2016-2019, pour un financement indicatif total de 600 millions d’Euros. Le PAREF-III vise à consolider et approfondir les résultats du PAREF-I et II et soutenir la mise en œuvre des réformes du programme triennal convenues entre le Gabon et le Fonds Monétaire International (FMI) à travers: (i) le renforcement de la consolidation budgétaire pour rétablir la stabilité macroéconomique; et (ii) l’appui à la diversification de l’économie pour une croissance inclusive à travers l’amélioration du climat des investissements et la compétitivité du secteur agricole. Il apportera aux autorités les ressources nécessaires pour absorber les chocs externes liés principalement à la chute des cours du pétrole, ainsi que pour consolider les réserves auprès de la BEAC et faciliter la mise en œuvre des réformes nécessaires à l’assainissement des finances publiques et à la transformation structurelle de l’économie.

This project is the third phase of the Support Program for Economic and Financial Reforms (PAREF-III) in Gabon. This is additional funding that follows a series of two programmatic General Budget Support (GBS) operations covering the period 2016-2019, for a total indicative funding of 600 million Euros. PAREF-III aims to consolidate and deepen the results of PAREF-I and II and support the implementation of the three-year program reforms agreed between Gabon and the International Monetary Fund (IMF) through: (i) strengthening fiscal consolidation to restore macroeconomic stability; and (ii) support for the diversification of the economy for inclusive growth through the improvement of the investment climate and the competitiveness of the agricultural sector. It will provide the authorities with the resources needed to absorb the external shocks related mainly to the fall in oil prices, as well as to consolidate the reserves with the BEAC and facilitate the implementation of the reforms necessary for fiscal consolidation and the structural transformation of the economy.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTERE DE L ECONOMIE, DES FINANCES, DU BUDGET ET DE LA PRIVATISATION

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

description.narrative: Total Interest Repayment in April of 2022
Total Interest Repayment in August of 2019

Total Interest Repayment in September of 2021

receiver-org.narrative: GOUVERNEMENT DE LA REPUBLIQUE DU GABON MINISTERE DE L'ECONOMIE ET DES FINANCES

title.narrative: Reduce the share of government contracts awarded by mutual agreement
Number of tax and customs adjustments made
Adoption of implementing texts on the facilitation of agricultural investment

target.value: The Agricultural Investment Incentive Framework introduced in 2017

actual.value: Adoption of the national agricultural strategy in 2019

title.narrative: Operationalise the computerised control system linking expenditure authorisation with the availability of related appropriations in order to reduce sources of domestic arrears

actual.value: An automated commitment monitoring system is in place to reduce domestic arrears by the end of 2018

title.narrative: Adoption of a budget law on setting the basis for forecasting and stabilizing oil revenues in relation to global oil prices

target.value: An order is adopted with a view to enhancing the predictability

actual.value: An order has been adopted with a view to enhancing the predictability of oil revenues and the sustainability of budget implementation in 2016

title.narrative: Creation of the Libreville Commercial Court

actual.value: Decree creating the Libreville Commercial Court adopted by the CM in 2018

title.narrative: Adoption of a Draft Law on the Revised Public Procurement Code

target.value: New Public Procurement Code adopted in 2018

actual.value: Draft Law on the Public Procurement Code adopted in the CM in 2017

target.value: Implementing texts adopted by the CM in 2019

actual.value: Draft decree drawn up and presented to the General Secretariat of the Government is being analysed by the Council of State before final consideration by the Council of Ministers

title.narrative: Strengthening of the electronic tax declaration and payment platform (e-tax)

target.value: The platform is limited to large companies subject to corporate tax in 2016

actual.value: General platform for all companies subject to corporate income tax (CIT) and VAT in 2019

title.narrative: Drafting of an Agricultural Policy Guidance Note including the gender dimension has been developed

target.value: Guidelines are adopted and sent to the Bank

actual.value: Guidelines were adopted and sent to the Bank in 2017

target.value: Procedures manual developed for the prioritisation and maturation of public investments

title.narrative: Prioritising public investment - Decree on the establishment

target.value: Decree on the establishment of a committee on the prioritisation and maturation of public investments and the systematisation of feasibility studies before the inclusion of major projects in the State budget

actual.value: Order adopted by the end of 2017 at the latest

title.narrative: Implementation of the Economic and Monetary Community of Central Africa Directive on Consolidated Financial Operations Table (TOFE)

actual.value: The Decree on TOFE adopted by the Council of Ministers in June 2017

title.narrative: Conducting an institutional audit aimed at streamlining the executing agencies

target.value: Audit report and action plan adopted 2017

actual.value: The audit report and action plan adopted in 2017 helped to reduce the number of public enterprises from 134 to 77 and, as a result, state subsidies also reduced

title.narrative: Adoption of a ministerial circular aimed at abolishing tax and customs exemptions without a legal basis granted

actual.value: The circular was adopted by the Council of Ministers in 2016

title.narrative: Validation of the National Land Use Plan by the Minister of Agriculture (PNAT)

actual.value: The letter validated by the Minister of Agriculture was sent to the Bank in 2016

title.narrative: Preparation of the reform roadmap on improving the business climate

actual.value: The roadmap adopted by the High Council in 2018

title.narrative: Conducting studies and developing action plans on revenue optimisation in the mining and telecommunications sector

actual.value: Two studies and action plans produced in 2017
